message:
Dear HR Manager,

A candidate has submitted a web form with the following details:

Candidate Details:

  • Name: {{ doc.applicant_name }}
  • Email: {{ doc.applicant_email }}
  • Phone Number: {{ doc.phone_number }}
  • Applied For: {{ doc.applied_for_designation }}
  • Job Offer: {{ doc.job_offer }}
  • Company: {{ doc.company }}

Please review the application and proceed accordingly.

Thank you,
HR System
name: HR Candidate Web Form Revert Mail
subject: HR Candidate Web Form Revert Mail
